name: Grandma's Muffins
description:
This is a demo, please download full version below.

Little Red Riding Hood is lost. Will you help her find her way to grandma's home?

Hereby, with great pride we present; " Grandma's Muffins "  an exiting 2D platformer action game. With wolfes, muffins and darkness itself.  If you have any feedback or exiting ideas to improve our game, feel free to share your comments on the youtube channel or below.

Please download the full game in HTML5 or Pico-8!

Thanks for your support!

Daphne & Joey
